chess

Interface ChessPiece


  • public interface ChessPiece
    ChessPiece interface to implement various functions for each chess piece
    Since:
    2019-03-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Hunt, Timothy Kinsey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check_capture(int rankdest, int filedest, chess.Square[][] chessboard)
      This method is used to determine capture of a piece
      java.lang.String ret_id()
      Returns the id for a piece
      java.lang.String ret_pos()
      Returns the grid coordinate a piece is on
      char ret_team()
      Returns the team a piece is on
      boolean validmove(int srcrank, int srcfile, int destrank, int destfile, chess.Square[][] chessboard)
      This method is used to ensure legal move for piece

    • Method Detail

      • validmove

        boolean validmove(int srcrank,
                  int srcfile,
                  int destrank,
                  int destfile,
                  chess.Square[][] chessboard)
        This method is used to ensure legal move for piece
        Parameters:
        srcrank - This is the starting rank
        srcfile - This is the starting file
        destrank - This is the destination rank
        destfile - This is the destination file
        chessboard - instance of a chessboard
        Returns:
        true or false depending if move is legal or not

      • check_capture

        boolean check_capture(int rankdest,
                      int filedest,
                      chess.Square[][] chessboard)
        This method is used to determine capture of a piece
        Parameters:
        rankdest - This is the destination rank of the piece
        filedest - This is the destination file of the piece
        chessboard - Takes an instance of chessboard
        Returns:
        true or false depending if a piece is at the given position or not

      • ret_team

        char ret_team()
        Returns the team a piece is on
        Returns:
        Letter of team B for Black, W for White

      • ret_pos

        java.lang.String ret_pos()
        Returns the grid coordinate a piece is on
        Returns:
        A character for column and number for the row together ex. a1

      • ret_id

        java.lang.String ret_id()
        Returns the id for a piece
        Returns:
        The team name concatenated with a letter for the piece ex. Black Knight id = BK
